title: GET/media/list schema
description: response from GET/media/list with params: business_id, hosted_id

business_id.description: the business_id associated with this media

from_hosted_site_id.description: not null if this media was extracted from this hosted_site id

my_lib_business_id.description: not null if this media is part of 'my gallery' for this business id

type.description: one of IMAGE/GIF/VIDEO so the client can render/display accordingly

twokey_url.description: the location in 2key servers where this media is stored, if it's internally stored

web_url.description: the location on the web where this media is stored, if this media isn't stored in 2key

url.description: convenience field, shows the location from which to render, has the value of twokey_url if not null, else web_url

x1.description: upper left default crop point horizontal pixel index, (0,0) is upper left corner

y1.description: upper left default crop point vertical pixel index, (0,0) is upper left corner

x2.description: lower right crop point horizontal pixel index

y2.description: lower right crop point vertical pixel index

presigned_upload_url.description: for media post requests the returned media will include this location to upload, presigned with credentials

s3_key.description: the s3 key where this media is stored in 2key
